column4: just installed amarok the music player and now i can't get music to play any suggestions
have you scanned for music?
I'm not sure what to suggest except searching google, sorry :S
ok it works now, after i loaded rythmbox music player but i dont understand why
that is odd, perhaps pulseaudio issues
first what are pulseaudio issues second do you think if i uninstall it, it will fix it
pulseaudio is a technology that allows you to control volumes independantly of programs
for example if i wanted flash to be quiet, and my music to be loud, i could set them independantly
oh i guess that makes sense
yea i get kinda how it would work, so uninstalling could be a solution
however, uninstalling isn't an option because its hard to configure alsa to work (alsa is the old way)
its not an option because why
it isn't really worth the hassle, as stuff will work :)
ok thanks for the help
no problem
ps do you know of a program like peer guardian but for ubuntu
i believe peerguardian has a client for linux
i have heard of moblock but its a lot of code and i dont have time to mess with it and i have also heard of ipblocker
i don't really have experience in that area im afraid
i will have to look again because i didn't think there was
ok thanks again
